item.description: there are many steps to the game - they are called steps not all are relevant to each expedidtion phase reffers to things that happen within the combat step

lots of fan-expansions exist they seem to focus on adding all-the-things from 40k to the game this tried to be an “edit” to clean up the game and make it “click” … so … take the crunch from a “magic the gathering” state to a “dominion” one also; it wants to make the game smoother and faster to play in person all of this is/should be done with the use of terms rather than text and cards rather than charts

all treasure and resources that player is carrying when explorers set out they can have a limited number of cards return all discarded cards to their resource or discovery decks on the ships count all “artifacts” and put them in a resource deck for the explorer add resource and discovery cards to the pile until you have 10 the explorer can have more than 10 cards if they only have artefacts discard all remaining cards since discards aren’t returned right awayl there’s the chance to see newer treasures as the game progresses shuffle the deck face-down and draw ?
